version_description:
Update Content:
1.Server optimized
2.Small bugs fixed
3.These are not important. What we really wanna do is to say: Merry Christmas!!!

[Contents optimized]
1.New Character: freak wizard-Sasatta;
2.Guild System: Your first choice to build up gangs and to meet girls,maybe boys...The biggest scale of a guild can be 100 players! You can obtain guild experiences through fighting; We will provide you exclusive guild chatting channel, guild ranking list and guild rewards.
3.Nine New pets: Ji Xiang,Ru Yi,Honey Bear,Furry Cat,Rigid,Wizard,etc
4.New Grade: After the Gradon Grade,here comes a new grade, Barbarian King Grade(It will be added at the begining of the new season in February)
5.New Collections: Star Protection Card,Trial Card
6.New Item: Rocket
7.Increased a mini map in the combat interface. You'll no longer be afraid that your teammates would get lost!
8.Spring Festival preferential direct-purchasing giftpack:
Spring Festival Gift,including Spring Festival pet, Ji Xiang
Spring festival Package, including Spring Festival pet,Ru Yi
9. Spring Festival decorations in map: Lion Dancing, Lucky Bag, Auspicious Cloud, Auspicious Cloud Pillar, Wine Jar, etc
*New Pet: The Wizard from Soul Knight

[New Character: Sasatta]
Role Orientation: Remote/Control
Sasatta can blow bubbles and wrap himself in the bubble. If the enemy touched the bubble, he would be like a lamb to the slaughter!
In the bubble, the movement will speed up, and the energy will not recover. Besides:
1.Using attack can beat the bubble out
2.Reusing skill, the bubble will stay for a while and then jump away itself

The Dark Adventure is optimized:
1. Add settlement link to show your record
2. You can bring your teammate back to life and can also add your teammate into account
3. You will become Invincible if you keep unmoving for 20 seconds

[BarbarQ Arena optimized]
1. Add [Fog Blast]. When half of the time has passed, there will be fog covering the battlefield gradually from the edge to the center. If you touched the mist , you will be knocked into the air;
2. In the battle of Gold Mushroom Grade ( When the next new version come, it will also include the Barbarian King Grade) , there will be a new preparation phase. When all the players are ready, the game will begin.

[Characters optimized]
1. K.K.Lion: When K.K.Lion fly to the bone, his movement can be Blocked.
2. Momolko: When Momolko turns from cat shape back to human shape, she won’t cause damage at the shape-shifting moment.

[Pets optimized]
There are some optimizations and adjustments to the following 15 Pets (For more details please refer to the corresponding post in our game community):
Broom, Bearaunty, Nutcracker, Fish, Stinky, Turlittle, Eyes, Dragon, Pumpkin, Bat, Puffer, Copydog, Farrari, Goast, Crab

[Skills optimized]
There are some optimizations and adjustments to all the damaging items like Protection Ball, Tornado, Shock Liquor, Block, Fire Shield, Honey Jar and so on. (For more details please refer to the corresponding post in our game community)

[Other Optimizations]
(1) 1V1 mode changes the playing model into mark deduction model
(2) 2V2 playing model is added into the Creat A Room mode
(3) New Package System is added to keep/use items
(4) New Store System is added to buy items
(5) The Bubble Item and Shock Liquor Item are both canceled
(6) The teaming system is optimized: Team Invitation will show its mode
(7) The friends chatting system is optimized: The Private Chat is moved to the Friends Bar; The Mail window will be separated
(8) The country flag can be hided
(9) More flags are added

[DIY Studio 3.0]
1. Optimization of Editor:
a. New organs: Unidirectional Signal Transmitter, Random Signal Transmitter, Role Portal
b. New functions: Map zoom, Charting subline
c. New scenes: Firework(Fragile), Firecracker(Bomb), Blessing Pack(Mushroom bag), Item-Red Packet
d. Game Outcome: Add game result(victory or defeat) of single game.
2. Optimization of Interaction:
a. Add displaying page of "Map creator's info"; Add "Subscribe author" function
b. Add "Comment/Map Report" function
c. Add “Team-up Invitation”function to room

[New Play Mode]
Red Packet War! Crazy and happy!
Match rule: 3v3v3. Red Packets drop according to the rank of a single round, also drop when your playing times reach a certain number.

[New Skin&Pet]
New Hero Skin: Valvyrie-Brave Princess, Sasatta-Wealth and Fortune
New Pet: Mermaid(Level-S), Piggieman(Level-S), Aquarius(Level-A)

[Optimize Battle]
BarbarQ Arena:
1. Game time changed to 5 minutes per round. Enjoy faster hapiness!
2. Add more environment features, visible to players of Barbarian King Tier or higher Tier.

[Optimize Pet Adventure]
1. Add special missions that can be challenged repeatedly everyday.
2. Add Daily Emergencies and your Pet Adventurers can battle with other players' Pet Adventurers
3. Add new system-Mushroom God. Collect god souls here and get best wishes from Mushroom God!
4. Open new chapters: Chapter IX, Chapter X

[Other Optimization]
1. Optimize Heroes: Do some balance to Sasatta's and PepePan's skills
2. Arming:
1) Add hint videos when assigning Pets
2) Add special effect for Level-S Pet. If the S-Pet got both attendant pet slots fully upgraded, the special effect will be upgraded and cooler.
3. Hero Proficiency: Except for BarbarQ Arena, using hero in the other 3 play modes, Dark Adventure, 1v1 and Red Packet War, also increases the hero's proficiency.
4. Walk Carefully: Fix the bug that PepePan's Slingshot and Barbatty's King Flower cannot hide together with the hero.
